mapper.select: SELECT SNSSEQ,ID,NICKNAME,PROFILE, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(SNSDATE) || '-' || TRUNC(((SYSDATE - SNSDATE) - TRUNC(SYSDATE - SNSDATE)) * 24) || '-' || TRUNC(MOD((SYSDATE - SNSDATE)*24,1)*60) AS SNSDATE, IMAGECONTENT, LIKECOUNT,COMMENTCOUNT,CONTENT FROM META_SNS ORDER BY SNSDATE
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SNS_LIKE WHERE LIKESEQ=#{likeseq} AND ID=#{id}
